articles.author: Natasha Bertrand, Megan Trimble, Jessie Yeung
articles.title: American soldier Travis King arrives back in US after being freed by North Korea - CNN
articles.description: US Army Private Travis King arrived back on United States soil Thursday after being returned to American custody weeks after he crossed into North Korea, a Defense Department official said.
articles.content:
US Army Private Travis King arrived back on United States soil Thursday after being returned to American custody weeks after he crossed into North Korea, a Defense Department official said.

articles.author: Hanna Webster
articles.title: Sleep apnea, explained: What to know about the condition that impacts an estimated 30M American adults - Pittsburgh Post-Gazette
articles.description: The chronic condition occurs when a person’s upper airway collapses during sleep, which leads to a temporary lapse in breathing.
